alert.note: Alert for Waupaca; Waushara (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:18PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Waushara and southwestern Waupaca Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 618 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Napowan Scout Camp, or 8 miles south of Waupaca, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waupaca, Hartman Creek State Park, Chain O` Lakes-King, Pine River, Saxeville, King, Sheridan, Scandinavia, Ogdensburg and Rural. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
